name: Sk8bordz
description:
Skateboarding game totally not ripped off from Martian Skater
Inspired by the cow pretending to be a man

Controls
Left/Right - Move
Up/Down - Manual / Trick Variations
Z - Jump
X - Flips / Grind Variation

-- post mortem haiku --
cows are the coolest
animations are tricky
kickflip on the moon
